website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable and give a sleek appearance. A great choice if you want something that covers a little more on top.
pros: High waist adds compression all the way to the natural waistline
Great fit and stretch makes them comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these! This is my first purchasing lululemon apparel and now I understand why women always rave about their clothing. Purchased a size 8 5 ft 5 172lbs Waist 30.5 Hips 42
customer_reviews.author: MaryGrace

customer_reviews.title: Beyond perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! I love the way the wunder under fits and to top it off, you cannot find this color in stores, they are a beautiful vibrant green! The high waist is amazing and all ober compression is just right. These are NOT see through like the newer material lulu is using. I am beyond happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: This is ridiculous and wasted my time
customer_reviews.text: These are from the batch that was recalled and they are trying to sell at full price! Unbelievable! You can see right through them! This is ridiculous and wasted my time. This company should be ashamed!
customer_reviews.author: Halston Littleton

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality but returned very long, perhaps defective?
customer_reviews.text: This product was way too long, the inseam listed is widely inaccurate which is unfortunately pretty common on Amazon. The fabric quality was very nice, I understand the Lulu brand appeal. I had to return the item because it seemed there was dye discoloration along the top waist area, also I didn’t like how long they were I would’ve had to wear them bunched at my ankles. The quality will definitely lead me to repurchase this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Smith

customer_reviews.title: These are not "High-Rise" Yoga Pants
customer_reviews.text: Seller is listing and selling these yoga pants as "high-rise" when they are actually "medium-rise" (see pic). Do not buy these if you are expecting to receive the "high-rise" version of these yoga pants.
customer_reviews.author: Vanhyfte2279

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Basic fabric and fit.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed and sent it back. I bought a pair of Lululemon's Wunder Under High Rise before (in black) and they were/are awesome. I liked this "dirty pink" and thought it'd be same quality and fit but it's not. I checked if I bought a knock off by accident. The fabric feels like every other cheap yoga pants brand you can get at any store. Same with the fit. The black pair makes every booty look good. This one does nothing. It looks horrible. The color isn't even really what it was in the picture. It's still a comfortable pair BUT not for that price. As I've said, I can get this kind of pair at F21 for $15.
customer_reviews.author: RxBxCCx

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic fit and function!
customer_reviews.text: They fit so good!! I am 5'6" 145 pounds 26" waist. I didn't believe the hype about Lululemon before this, but the fabric is fantastic quality and offers great compression without feeling overly tight! Plus it makes your butt look really good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful leggings.
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit and feel. They were recommended by my physician for the support they have.
customer_reviews.author: Kim holland

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer service and product
customer_reviews.text: The company (Lululemon in Great Britain) was TERRIBLE and not true to return policies, did not give back full refund for the pants nor did they follow their free return policy if the item did not work. I will never buy from Lululemon again. The product was also way overpriced for the value. Victoria’s Secret total knockout pants are much less expensive and WAY better quality, overall fit, and more flattering than Lululemon. Thankfully Amazon made things right, otherwise I would’ve been out $35.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Knockoff
customer_reviews.text: This product came to us from china then from San Francisco. We feel it is a knockoff due to spelling on labels incorrect . Things are just different from lulu lemon stores
customer_reviews.author: April mccourt

customer_reviews.title: These are really comfortable but thick
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfortable but thick.. I am currently overseas in the desert and it certainly is too hot outside for them. Will wear them when the weather gets cooler
customer_reviews.author: Claudia M. Manriquez

customer_reviews.title: ... in my life and she said that they were comfortable but not any better than yoga pants that she ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a gift for a teen in my life and she said that they were comfortable but not any better than yoga pants that she got anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I know lululemon is tough to commit to because of the money, but I’ve had pairs of their pants (that I wear regularly) that have lasted 12 years now! So I’d say they’re worth it! Plus, these are so comfy and I love the high waist on those days I need a little extra help keeping the bloat in!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie J. Bot

customer_reviews.title: Defective pants. Material quailty poor.
customer_reviews.text: Everything about the fit was great but the material quailty was horrible. Worst lululemons I have ever owned. I worn them 3 times to a gentle yoga class. Washed 3 times cold water, gentle cycle and hung dry and they are pilling like crazy. I have never has a pair that was just terrible quality of fabric. I'm not sure if these were defective or what but I am extremly diaspinted. I should of just went to the Lululeomn store. Purchased a size 4 I wish I would of worn them right away so I knew soon enough to return. I will be contacting cooperate to see what my options are.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Schulte

customer_reviews.title: Too much money
customer_reviews.text: Returned them they were wonderful but too expensive when $12 yoga pants were just as great!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Gauger

customer_reviews.title: Not luon fabric. You pay $30 to ship back
customer_reviews.text: Be Aware!! It’s lyrica fiber, the kind that sticks and pick up every little fuzzy! Noticed immediately this was not the fabric I liked, requested refund but they don’t pay for it and you have to ship to Canada! Cheapest price to ship back in close to $30 with tax. Beeeee Carefulllllll!
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Real lululemon!
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed to see that they were real! I still would prefer cheaper leggings with a more buttery material, but if you love lulu’s then these are perfect for you!
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: First Lululemon purchase & so far I love them. I am 5'9" and the length is perfect, & I love the high weighst.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and flattering
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the first garment and buy one size down. Very comfortable and a flattering fit. I hope they last a long time for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Rutcliff

customer_reviews.title: Great print. I love lulu and get lots of ...
customer_reviews.text: Great print. I love lulu and get lots of compliments on these but they are more high waisted than I would prefer. But if that's what you want, that's what you'll get!
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Ong

customer_reviews.title: so comfortable and soft
customer_reviews.text: I thought 100+ $ to spend on 'just another pair of leggings' I WAS WRONG - THESE ARE FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product was delivered
customer_reviews.text: I returned it. The product delivered had glue spots. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: QueenofGatos

customer_reviews.title: Warm, thick tights
customer_reviews.text: A little thicker than I thought they would be but still great tights!!
customer_reviews.author: SCarnes

customer_reviews.title: Keeps everything where it should be but stretches!!!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite!!! Must have!!! Keeps everything in place but stretches til no tomorrow!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy N.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite style of this brand
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable. Got them for my daughter and she loves them!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. Chenin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My favorite leggings but very pricey. Can get similar ones half the cost.
customer_reviews.author: sandjo31

customer_reviews.title: Security Tag still on Pants
customer_reviews.text: These pants came with a store security Ink tag still on them, unable to wear them and have to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and flexible
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my girlfriend she says they are extremely comfy and easy to move in and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Colton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter and was a perfect fit and selection for what she wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Angela HC Dimalanta

customer_reviews.title: DON'T GET THESE!
customer_reviews.text: This pair honestly just sucked. I recently had my actual lulu lemon leggings stolen and so I bought these. If you are looking for lulu leggings or products go to their site or store. These are fake.
customer_reviews.author: Sherman H Thacher

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing and I've gotten great compliments on the color and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing and I've gotten great compliments on the color and fit! 2 day shipping with Prime and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: mrsathanas

customer_reviews.title: Shop around first
customer_reviews.text: Great leggings. But got same pair in nyc on 5 th Ave for 98$
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AHHH-MAZING
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my girlfriend and she just loves them!! Awesome purchase, it’s expensive but totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: James Young

customer_reviews.title: its great for a girlfriend gift
customer_reviews.text: i bought it for a girl because she really wanted it so i bought if for her but it takes a long time to get to her house though
customer_reviews.author: Evan Ellefson

customer_reviews.title: Butter soft and super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these! Perfect fit and the comfort is amazing

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: This came with holes and was low waisted and not the correct brand was under armor
customer_reviews.author: suzy peek

customer_reviews.title: No official tag
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with a Lululemom tag... not sure if it's not real or I got a used pair.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Pretty color, overall good fit. I'm petite so on me there's a good 8-10 extra inches at the ankles. Way overvpriced
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: I always love lululemon, I will still ordering from you 😊
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size 8 , got size 6 , I need Exchange it , I'm sure the right size will make difference , I always love lululemon, I will still ordering from you 😊

customer_reviews.title: Way too long
customer_reviews.text: These were way to long for me. Reasonably nice quality but overall not as amazing as I'd hoped they would be and way too expensive to just be average yoga pants
customer_reviews.author: Booboo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy! Fits perfect, good quality and soft fabric, no see through at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rams Kanouni

product_meta.title: Lululemon Wunder Under Yoga Pants High-Rise
product_meta.description: This high-rise take on Lululemon's classic Wunder Under tights gives you the extra boost of coverage (and courage!) you need when you're stretching your limits. From headstands to high kicks, they've got your back.Lululemon created these pants out of cottony-soft and supportive Full-On Luon fabric to be a no-fuss tight for our yoga practice and beyond. The second-skin fit makes it easy to check our alignment mid-pose and tucks easily into our boots when we're going straight from Hatha class to happy hour...These are Lululemon's best selling pant in a very rare, hard to find colorway. These are absolutely great for running, biking, and other cardio work and even better for just wearing around the house. They are both comfortable and flattering. Measurements: 32" inseam, overall length 38" from waist to cuff. Size 4 Waist: 26" Size 6 Waist: 28" Size 8 Waist: 30" Size 10 Waist: 32" Size 12 Waist: 34" Stretches another 2+ inches more.
feature_bullets: These pants are specifically designed for yoga and training.
The waistband is specifically made to lay flat against your skin and not dig in.
The lycra fibre construction allows the pants to keep their stretch while retaining their shape.
The waistband contains a storage pocket to hold your key or card
